dict.acceptation: 薄片；一部分；（因失误而打出的）曲线球；

sent.orig: The division of the picture into slice groups is a partitioning of the picture.
sent.trans: 分割图象为slice组称为图象的分割。

sent.orig: The partitioning is specified by the macroblock to slice group map.
sent.trans: 分割由MB到slice组的映射来指定。

sent.orig: The division of a slice into macroblock pairs is a partitioning.
sent.trans: 将一个slice分割为MB对称为分割。

sent.orig: Cut into streaky pork thin slice, bean curd slice, bottom go into boil of pot in.
sent.trans: 将五花肉切成薄片，豆腐切片，下入煮沸的锅中。

sent.orig: Wash, peel and slice tomato. Slice carrot.
sent.trans: 将番茄洗净，去皮及切块；甘笋切块备用。
